title: Your Favorite Champion Now Lives With You
body:
What is different? What is it like? Do you like it? What do other people think about you now? What are your thoughts on this?

For me it's {{champion:60}}.

Can't step on any spiders, or I'll have to face her and face her wrath >.> And now there are cobwebs everywhere inside and out and spiders infest every single corner. Not too sure if I like spiders enough to live like _this_ . Oh, and now everybody thinks that I'm mad since I live with a part human, part spider who eats humans. 
Welp, better get used to living with everyone thinking I'm a weirdo. Sigh.

I'm f-cked, my neighbors are f-cked and the town is f-cked.

{{champion:76}}  I could live with it.
Mating season all year ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Every 5 minutes there's always a group of 5 knocking on my door and telling me that have i ever seen this guy. {{champion:157}}
{{champion:34}}  Free air conditioning and free ice cubes :)

{{champion:17}} : "Hey, I'm just gonna go take a long walk through the jungle and BATHE IN THE BLOOD OF THOSE WHO OPPO-"

Me: "Just don't bury them in my backyard. People are asking questions."

{{champion:17}} : "Fine."

{{champion:245}} 

He always beats me at everything. Video games, board games, bets, etc. It's almost as if he knows everything that I'm going to do 4 seconds later.

The usual four...

{{champion:10}} - Things get a bit stricter.  A lot more rules to follow, a lot more chores to do, but it keeps the place utterly immaculate.  Nothing is wasted and everything is always clean.  I still don't know what she looks like under that armor since she wears it all the time.  But at least I can troll Jehovah's Witnesses by letting her answer the door.

{{champion:25}} - I'm used to being around goths and emos so I could get used to her pretty quickly.  She'd be best friends with the guinea pig because the guinea pig likes everybody.  Would be focused on making her some friends so she's not so gloomy all the time.  Also, free baked goods whenever I come hope, that'd be pretty sweet.

{{champion:102}} - The last time I let her play League, she raged so hard the house burned down and she spent half an hour in dragon form trying to fight the firemen.  Once pacified by fire hoses, she changed back, apologized, and offered to put me up at 'her friend Jarvan's' place.  I now live in a marble palace.  Sweet.

{{champion:112}} - I get many angry calls from Verizon about my internet usage.  Then I discover Viktor has optimized the connection, hijacked the pipeline, and hacked into Riot's database to set up his desktop as an East Coast server specifically so he can play with zero ping.  Clever bastard.  Eventually he upgrades the house to be entirely self-sustaining and I never need to move again.

>Then I discover Viktor has optimized the connection, hijacked the pipeline, and hacked into Riot's database to set up his desktop as an East Coast server specifically so he can play with zero ping.

Yeah... um... can I borrow Viktor real quick.

{{champion:432}}  I think this would be pretty alright. Pretty much no downsides. His noises are kind of awesome and would probably help me sleep lol.

{{champion:28}}  Basically living alone.

{{champion:201}} I would always feel safe at all times.

{{champion:103}}  ;)

{{champion:112}}  I would wake up one day with robotic limbs.

{{champion:16}}  This would be swell.

I am currently getting my degree in robotics and am i outstanding computer programmer that has tons of experience with problems, i prefer to talk to my computer that actual people and i kinda feel a bit out of place when it comes to the world.

{{champion:61}} 

;-; at least i can date a robot now...

but in a seriousness though, living with Orianna would be really rather fun and delightful due to the fact that i live in a rather large city and enjoy going to museums and constantly going to conventions, Orianna is very curious and wanting to learn more and she would be the right dose to let me get out of the house and have someone to be kinda creepy with. 

God...i just reread that...im a loser.

yeah considering most the others are from shadow isles.. idt i need them in my house.. i think i need my soul

Not to mention seeing her early morning bed head and placating her with coffee then having her wing man for you later than night. Then getting her more coffee the next morning after the hangover.

find me a downside.

{{champion:37}} : I wouldn't mind having background music. Or having the occasional DJ sona party.

{{champion:90}}  Voidlings are everywhere but are pretty cool, however I do have an issue with the excess amount of pure void energy pouring into the house.....and I think a voidling is eating my neighbors dog that's kinda awkward

{{champion:8}}: As long as he cleans up the blood, I'm cool with it. I mean, I can stand the puns because my father's just as bad when it comes to bad jokes, so I have experience dealing with that shit. And I bet he could help with sowing costumes (because we all know those pants are from a circus tent)

{{champion:72}}: I'd need to do some remodeling so he can move around, but hey. If he's willing to help, those gems of his can pay, plus they seem to grow naturally anyway.

{{champion:37}}: One of my friends with bigger boobs and telepathy, got it.

{{champion:113}}: Need a barn or something for Bristle, but hey: Cool ride. And Bristle's not too shabby either ;)

{{champion:99}}: Hello anime/nerd convention cosplay partner. Plus, she seems like a sweet girl. Possibly a bit loony, but aren't we all?

{{champion:154}}: My sweets/snacks bill skyrockets. But hey, no issues with spills and stains.
